name: Let There Be An End
description:
Roll the Orange Die for a chance to activate one of the blue Fuel Die, change the environment, or to end the game.

When activated a Fuel Die will change to green.

Rolling a green Fuel die will award you fuel and points corresponding to the roll result.

Spacebar - Thrust Forward

X - Toggle lights on/off

Z - Roll the die in front of you

Esc - Pause/Unpause

Out of Fuel? Restart the Game.
